headline: PPG highlights 2024 performance during annual meeting of shareholders
summary: PITTSBURGH, April 17, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today held its annual meeting of shareholders where Tim Knavish, PPG chairman and chief executive officer, highlighted the company’s 2024 performance.

raw.headline: PPG highlights 2024 performance during annual meeting of shareholders
raw.summary: PITTSBURGH, April 17, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today held its annual meeting of shareholders where Tim Knavish, PPG chairman and chief executive officer, highlighted the company’s 2024 performance.

headline: PPG Board of Directors announce quarterly dividend of 68 cents per share
summary: PITTSBURGH, April 17, 2025--The Board of Directors of PPG (NYSE:PPG) today declared a regular quarterly dividend of 68 cents per share, payable June 12 to shareholders of record May 12.
